customer_query: What is your refund policy? I need help with my order.
assistant_response:
**Refund Policy**: You can return products within 30 days of purchase. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item.

To start a return, contact support@company.com or call 1-800-SUPPORT.
